title: Iran violates human rights, imprisons pol. oppo.

content.prompt: With regard to human rights in Iran, the Iranian government has acted in which of following ways?

choices.label: The government mandates that women only have one child.
The government targets and imprisons political opponents.
The government protects the religious rights of Baha’is.
The government supports gay rights and women’s rights.
The government banned executions during Ahmedinejad’s presidency.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
